files.name: main.py
files.content:
StartingNumber=input('Starting number?')
StartingNumber=int(StartingNumber)


while(True):
    EndingNumber=input('Ending number?')
    EndingNumber=int(EndingNumber)
    if(EndingNumber > StartingNumber): 
        break
    print('Ending number must be greater than', StartingNumber)    
    
total=0

for counter in range(StartingNumber,EndingNumber + 1):
   total= counter + total

print('')
print('The sum of numbers from',StartingNumber,'to',EndingNumber,'is', total)
